about_the_game:
"The Story of Agna" is a 3D platformer about a journey through the enchanted taiga, based on ethnic motifs and mythology.

You are a teenager turned into a midget. In the wilds of the ancient taiga, your brother was lost from sight, and you yourself risk becoming a victim of the mythical spirit of the swamps. Clear forest streams, the backs of animals, wet swamps, crunchy dead wood and more you have to run and jump over, hide from pursuit, and crush small pests

KEY FEATURES

•Atmosphere

The northern territories are harsh and picturesque: spectacular water locations, greenery and bright berries, changes in weather and time of day transform the forests beyond recognition. Carefully composed soundtracks and voice acting enhance the gaming experience.

• Gameplay that requires concentration

The familiar forest terrain will become a challenge and a puzzle: when the puddles become the size of a lake, and the holes become tunnels. Be prudent in your choice of path and precise in your movements - this is the key to success.

•Cultural layer

The plot of the game is based on existing myths and legends of the peoples of Khanty and Mansi and includes educational information about the unique and rare local flora.

•Funny and mysterious characters.

Some creatures will help you with deeds or magic, while for others you are a victim.

New facets of the world are waiting, and your brother needs your help - only you have the power to get to him through the bumps and mysticism!

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 3.59 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Threat of bumps? Jumping on mushrooms? Get stuck inside a tree? You will have to experience this,because you are a very,very small person in a deep forest! In an effort to save your dear soul, first save yourself from the attacks of an insidious pursuer and go through a variety of natural terrains.
